Welcome home to Desert Oasis where convenience and comfort maximize your daily routine.

Start your day with your favorite beverage at Boulevard Cafe or Butler’s Coffee and head out to explore.
Discover all Palmdale has to offer.

Stop by a local favorite like Tacos El Superior, Lee Esther’s Creole and Cajun Cooking, or Lucky Luke Brewing for dinner and drinks, and then head back to Desert Oasis, where all the comforts of home are waiting for you.
Experience better living in Palmdale when you come home to Desert Oasis.
Contact us to schedule a tour today!
